bibl.title: The Erbstreit Papyri. A Bilingual Dossier from Pathyris of the Second Century BC
bibl.note: P. Erbstreit 1-20 (partly unpublished). - Preface. Concordance of inventory numbers and editions. - Introduction: 1. The texts; - 2. The parties and persons involved in the inheritance disputes; - 3. The objects of the contention; - 4. The first contendings; - 5. The second contendings. - The texts: 1-20. - Conclusion. - Appendix I: Graeco-Egyptian double names in the dossier; - Appendix II: Bilingualism in the dossier. - Word indexes.
bibl.seg: Katelijn Vandorpe and Sven P. Vleeming, The Erbstreit Papyri. A Bilingual Dossier from Pathyris of the Second Century BC = Studia Demotica. 13.
Leuven - Paris - Bristol, CT, Peeters, 2017, xii-216 pp., figg., 40 pll. ISBN 978-90-429-3188-6. â‚¬94.
